caption.p: Na‐storage mechanism: a) in situ XRD patterns of the P2‐Na 0.76Cu 0.22Fe 0.30Mn 0.48O 2 nano‐necklaces electrode during the first charge/discharge process at 0.1 C, as well as b) the contour plots. Ex situ XPS of high‐resolution c) Cu 2p, d) Fe 2p, and e) Mn 2p spectra at various charged/discharged states of the P2‐Na 0.76Cu 0.22Fe 0.30Mn 0.48O 2 cathode.
